messages.subject: OT: tiny bathtubs
messages.msgSnippet: Our bathtub was tiny at our last house, too.  We were not allowed to have a hottub in housing either.  So, my dh put a round galvanized watering tub for
messages.messageBody:
Our bathtub was tiny at our last house, too. We were not allowed to have a
hottub in housing either. So, my dh put a round galvanized watering tub for
animals on the side porch. It was surrounded by a nice tall wooden fence. A
few times a week we would put the boys to bed early and fill up the tub from the
hot water faucet on the washer. It was a great fix for us and we got our
bathtub time together =)

Heather


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
